input_email_body:
Subject: Concerns with Digital Campaign Metrics Monitoring

Hello Customer Support, I am contacting you to address an ongoing issue with our digital campaign metrics My name is Liu Wei.. It seems the tracking may be failing due to a potential integration problem with Kaspersky security software. Despite attempts to restart Docker and verify the HyperX RAM settings, the issue remains unresolved You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. Kindly review and resolve this, and please request any further details you might need from me. I am eagerly awaiting your response. Many thanks for your attention and help.
